d05e96f082e1a42c510b3dd21da82ef6316b088a.commitMessage: Issue #6320: added REMOVE_CONDITIONALS mutator for naming

641b6b2c0689fc35d6a3d77a7215fd1d9ce2a2b8.commitMessage: Issue #5812: Rename all utility classes to xxxxUtil

3bcd2a83aac2ebc2fb9a8e34599d1d565a047b22.commitMessage: Issue #5124: removed usage of branchContains for modifiers

4d2e6647f9e8385749c382bcab5e64965a943178.commitMessage:
Rename boolean methods to start with question word. #1555

Fixes `BooleanMethodNameMustStartWithQuestion` inspection violations.

Description:
>Reports boolean methods whose names do not start with a question word. Boolean methods that override library methods are ignored by this inspection.

1bd30555eac039d0486dffb3fc43b7a34117909b.commitMessage:
Remove useless parentheses to fix PMD violations, issue #744

Parentheses are considered unnecessary if the evaluation order of an expression remains unchanged if the parentheses are removed.

373c90a1090537de5b8151c6088534a63744edb2.commitMessage: #282 fixed. Since Java 8 we can have methods body in interfaces.

2bf724effc3c43a43fbe254dd81985f618be8eee.commitMessage: Enhanced the naming checks ConstantName, MemberName, MethodName and StaticVariableName to utilise the access control tuning features of AbstractAccessControlNameCheck. Thanks to Steve McKay for patch #2893581.

35d1673788bbbac8263fdb69275dc6a63b095a24.commitMessage: Making local variables final where possible.

166157213b0889e2a9d95f46826bbd5eb42ab9e8.commitMessage: Now ConstantName check will skip serialPersistentFields (bugid 1097285)

d80cbf61042a3901b2f61de7ad4494ff93ea0e3c.commitMessage:
Moved the Naming checks to a sub-package. I had some
spare time between meetings today.

Avoid duplicate matching and logging code by introding an abstract name check class.
